SEARCH
Package de.jakob.tasks.gartenarbeit

Klasse Feld

java.lang.Object
de.jakob.tasks.gartenarbeit.Feld
public class Feld extends Object
The Feld class contains logic for selecting and manipulating plants based on pairs of plants. It demonstrates polymorphic behavior and pattern matching with the PflanzenPaar class.

  • Konstruktordetails

      public Feld()

  • Methodendetails

    • auswahl

      public static Pflanze auswahl(PflanzenPaar pair)
      Determines which plant to select from a given pair based on specific criteria.
      • If the pair contains a Rosengewaechs, the first such plant is chosen, and its length is set to its maximum. If the plant is a Himbeere, it is trimmed after selection.
      • If the pair contains a Salbei and a BlauerEisenhut, the selection depends on the length of the Salbei: if it is at least 5, the BlauerEisenhut is chosen; otherwise, the Salbei is selected.
      • In all other cases, the first plant in the pair is selected by default.
      Parameter:
      pair - a pair of plants (PflanzenPaar) to evaluate
      Gibt zurück:
      the selected plant based on the given criteria

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to demonstrate the functionality of the auswahl method with various plant pairs.
      Parameter:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)
